product_name: WTB Speed V ProGel Saddle - Men's
long_description: With ProGel for cushioning comfort, this performance saddle offers perineal area and soft-tissue relief. Soft shell with Comfort Zone(TM) channel reduces pressure on the perineal area without detracting from the support of the saddle. Features an abbreviated nose, a 6mm center drop and a slightly wider rear and mid-section for additional support. Rounded profile allows easy transitions. Made with durable synthetic cover and hollow chromoly rails.
short_description: With ProGel for cushioning comfort, this performance saddle offers perineal area and soft-tissue relief.
